p: The chemical composition of the lamella has been determined with an EDS by scanning transmission electron microscopy spectrum image mode in the Thermo Fischer® Titan Themis TEM, operated at 300 kV. Quantification has been carried out on the basis of the stoichiometric oxides of the Van Cappellen and Doukhan ( 1994) method. The k‐factors (Cliff & Lorimer, 1975) have been obtained using stoichiometric oxide standard specimens which contain the studied phase elements.
